container.heading: Maryland Minority Business Enterprise/Federal Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Program

section.heading: Incorporation by Reference.
section.text: The Maryland Minority Business Enterprise Program Manual, formerly known as The Maryland Minority Business Enterprise/Federal Disadvantaged Business Enterprise Program (Maryland Department of Transportation, November 1999), as amended February 2009 and July 2014, is incorporated by reference.

annotations.annotation: State Finance and Procurement Article, §§14-301—14-308; Transportation Article, §2-103; Annotated Code of Maryland
Regulation .01 adopted as an emergency provision effective March 31, 1978 (5:8 Md. R. 587); adopted permanently effective August 11, 1978 (5:16 Md. R. 1259)
Regulation .01A amended effective June 29, 1979 (6:13 Md. R. 1129)
Regulation .01B adopted effective December 14, 1979 (6:25 Md. R. 1981)
Regulation .01 amended effective December 12, 1980 (7:25 Md. R. 2337)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective May 14, 1981 (8:11 Md. R. 971); emergency status expired September 26, 1981
Regulation .01 amended effective January 18, 1982 (9:1 Md. R. 22)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective May 4, 1984 (11:11 Md. R. 960); adopted permanently effective August 13, 1984 (11:16 Md. R. 1392)

Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective June 1, 1985 (12:13 Md. R. 1275); emergency status extended at 12:17 Md. R. 1697; adopted permanently effective December 2, 1985 (12:24 Md. R. 2349)
Regulation .01C adopted as an emergency provision effective November 27, 1985 (12:26 Md. R. 2541); adopted permanently effective March 10, 1986 (13:5 Md. R. 546)
Regulation .01 repealed and new Regulation .01 adopted effective October 5, 1987 (14:20 Md. R. 2143)

Regulation .01 amended effective October 16, 1989 (16:20 Md. R. 2181); July 6, 1992 (19:13 Md. R. 1203); May 9, 1994 (21:9 Md. R. 751); January 1, 1996 (22:26 Md. R. 2030); March 20, 2000 (27:5 Md. R. 585)
Regulation .01 amended as an emergency provision effective March 13, 2009 (36:8 Md. R. 592); amended permanently effective September 7, 2009 (36:18 Md. R. 1382)
Regulation .01 amended effective April 13, 2015 (42:7 Md. R. 570)
